verses.verse: (Rev. 6:2) And in Your majesty ride prosperously because of truth, humility, and righteousness; And Your right hand shall teach You awesome things.
Your arrows are sharp in the heart of the King’s enemies; The peoples fall under You.
((Ps. 93:2); Heb. 1:8, 9) Your throne, O God, is forever and ever; A ((Num. 24:17)) scepter of righteousness is the scepter of Your kingdom.
You love righteousness and hate wickedness; Therefore God, Your God, has (Ps. 2:2) anointed You With the oil of (Ps. 21:6; Heb. 1:8, 9) gladness more than Your companions.
All Your garments are (Song 1:12, 13) scented with myrrh and aloes and cassia, Out of the ivory palaces, by which they have made You glad.
(Song 6:8) Kings’ daughters are among Your honorable women; (1 Kin. 2:19) At Your right hand stands the queen in gold from Ophir.
Listen, O daughter, Consider and incline your ear; (Deut. 21:13; Ruth 1:16, 17) Forget your own people also, and your father’s house;
So the King will greatly desire your beauty; (Ps. 95:6; (Is. 54:5)) Because He is your Lord, worship Him.
And the daughter of Tyre will come with a gift; (Is. 49:23) The rich among the people will seek your favor.
The royal daughter is all glorious within the palace; Her clothing is woven with gold.
(Song 1:4) She shall be brought to the King in robes of many colors; The virgins, her companions who follow her, shall be brought to You.
